# [Interview #3: TPOD Signing Report - John Novak, Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=3#21)

#### Question

Does the Snakes and Foxes game played in the Two Rivers have anything to do with the 'finn?

#### Robert Jordan

RAFO.

#### John Novak

(My answer: Duh?)
